name: tv
description: Turn off your TV instead of putting it on standby

name: dishwasher
description: Turn your dishwasher down from 65⁰C to 55⁰C

name: kettle
description: When using your kettle, only boil the water you need

name: dryer
description: Stop using your tumble dryer, hang your washing instead

name: heating
description: Turn down the heating by 1⁰C and wear warmer clothes at home

name: bulbs
description: Replace 5 traditional lightbulbs with long-lasting LED lightbulbs

name: meat
description: Swap 1 portion of beef for 1 portion of chicken each week
